about_the_game:
Parking Attendant Simulator puts you in charge of transforming a rundown parking lot into a thriving business in a dystopian future. In a society divided by class, you’ll cater to the needs of everyday commuters while striving to attract the wealthy elite. Start small by cleaning up trash, repairing broken equipment, and expanding your lot with new facilities to draw in more customers. With enough success, you can even upgrade your parking lot into a major transportation hub by adding mass transit stops.

But it’s not all about business growth—this world is as selfish as it is competitive. Manage the chaotic entry and exit of vehicles, preventing collisions and keeping your lot in order. And if things get messy? Well, you have... other ways of handling that. Defend your lot from thieves and vandals, make shady deals, or embrace a life of crime yourself. How you run your parking empire is entirely up to you.

Will you rise as a hero for the common folk or join the ranks of the corrupt? The choice is yours in Parking Attendant Simulator!

Key Features

  • Restore and run a Parking lot in a busy city

  • Build new services such as vending machines, automatic barriers and storage facilities

  • Manage entry and exit to the Parking lot to prevent accidents

  • Scare off vandals and thieves to maintain your reputation

  • Lots of interesting events on top of normal gameplay

  • add decorations and customizations to your parking lot

  • Manage stock levels for services

  • Cleaning bird poop!

content_descriptors.notes:
Depictions of mild violence
Depictions of theft

Start small by cleaning up trash, repairing broken equipment, and expanding your lot with new facilities to draw in more customers. And if things get messy? Well, you have... other ways of handling that. Defend your lot from thieves and vandals, make shady deals, or embrace a life of crime yourself. name: Parking Attendant Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Inherit a run-down parking lot from a relative and turn it into a mass-transit hub for all classes of people. Extend and upgrade services to attract new customers and keep their precious vehicles safe.
